topic.name: What Is History?
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for What Is History? in History & Social Studies

objectives.sub_topic_name: Biblical Chronology as a Historical Framework (Creation to Consummation)
objectives.objective_text: Name Creation as the beginning.

objectives.objective_text: Identify a diary or letter as 'real'.

objectives.objective_text: Name a history book as a story about the past.

objectives.objective_text: Identify a textbook as a secondary source.

objectives.objective_text: Identify digging for old things.

objectives.objective_text: Identify God as the King of time.

objectives.objective_text: Identify the author's opinion.

objectives.objective_text: Identify a book.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Oral Traditions vs Written Records (Methods of Transmission)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a scribe (writer).

objectives.objective_text: Recall that an eyewitness sees it happen.

objectives.objective_text: Observe old objects (artifacts).

objectives.objective_text: Recall that trash tells a story.

objectives.objective_text: Observe a museum exhibit.

objectives.objective_text: Recall that Jesus is coming back.

objectives.objective_text: Observe the order of Bible stories.

objectives.objective_text: Recall that things change over time.

objectives.objective_text: Observe old photos vs. new photos.

objectives.objective_text: Observe that the winner usually tells the story.

objectives.objective_text: Recall that people remembered stories before writing.

objectives.objective_text: Recall that God has a plan.

objectives.objective_text: Observe God helping people in the Bible.

objectives.objective_text: Recall that long ago means many years.

objectives.objective_text: Explain Carbon dating concepts (intro).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Biblical Chronology as a Historical Framework (Creation to Consummation)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the 4 parts: Creation, Fall, Redemption, Restoration.

objectives.objective_text: Explain BC (Before Christ) and AD (Anno Domini).

objectives.objective_text: Place major Bible events on a timeline.

objectives.objective_text: Explain the significance of the Incarnation as the hinge of history.

objectives.objective_text: Defend the historicity of the Resurrection.

objectives.objective_text: Defend the Christian view of history as teleological (moving toward a goal).

objectives.objective_text: Defend the pursuit of objective truth despite bias.
